website_summaries.verdict: A small-sized fridge in bright colors that fits well in any dorm room or office space.
pros: Fun colors (also comes in purple and green)
Can change the side this fridge opens
Door basket can handle a 2 liter bottle
20-inch height makes it easy to put in a lot of places
Includes a freezer space to make ice
cons: There is not a lot of space in this refrigerator
It is on the small side for dorm fridges

customer_reviews.title: Came damage free, it works, can't ask for ...
customer_reviews.text: Came damage free, it works, can't ask for much more. Except maybe the connector for the freezer part to be up higher to it doesn't stop the tray from going all the way back (when the shelf is at the top level). Also, it does make a (fairly) loud "click" when the fridge turns off/on. I got the orange one so I could get a white 'T' magnet for the Vols. for at least 1/3 off the price of an "official" TN Vols fridge! Fits perfect under my desk in my office. Go big orange!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gilman

customer_reviews.title: The Great and the Convenient
customer_reviews.text: The fridge totally met my expectations. It cools things beautifully and is really quiet. Very happy with my purchase. It will be kept in the bedroom so that I can take my early medication and not have to go downstairs to the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ed .Box was punctured during shipment so it needs better protection.
customer_reviews.text: It was damaged during shipping. Had two dents. But my daughter said it gives it character. My grandson will get it on Wednesday for his birthday. Do not know how much H2O it will hold but it is really neat. And it’s his Clemson colors.
customer_reviews.author: lorraine wright

customer_reviews.title: Not good if you have stuff you don't want to freeze ...
customer_reviews.text: Has a very loud "clank" noise when the compressor turns on. The unit also goes into freezing temperatures on the warmest setting. Not good if you have stuff you don't want to freeze and if it's within earshot of your sleeping quarters. Would be good for an office setting though and if you were just storing drinks or something.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Daughter gets lots of compliments and found perfect size trays for ice cubes
customer_reviews.text: Really cute for a small fridge. Daughter gets lots of compliments and found perfect size trays for ice cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Chillin' with the fridge
customer_reviews.text: Cute and exactly what I was looking for. Happy to see that it is Energy Star-rated. Color is more like "coral" or something like that. Not a vibrant orange.
customer_reviews.author: seeweed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cute lil fridge
customer_reviews.text: Super cold and small enough to tuck in a corner in my office so much lunch is not in the gross lunchroom fridge. And the orange color is fun and cheerful. My coworkers are jelly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little fridge!
customer_reviews.text: Great little fridge for the office! Keeps it nice and cold. Much more practical than the smaller ones that only hold 6 cans.
customer_reviews.author: Christy and Dave

customer_reviews.title: Fickle
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this thing have had it for less than 2 weeks and it’s not working. I gave it 2 stars because when it did work it was just what I needed. Will reach out to the seller and get it replaced . Major disappointment !
customer_reviews.author: HelenB

customer_reviews.title: Great size for an office.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size fridge for my husband's office. I added an Oregon Beavers sticker to it so it fit his team too. He has been pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: For price and quality you can't go wrong. Great little refrigerator, perfect for my personal office.
customer_reviews.author: Toddio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the color! Fits well, and is a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: tfelix01

customer_reviews.title: I bought the orange one and I really like it. Keeps things cold and it is very ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute little fridge! I bought the orange one and I really like it. Keeps things cold and it is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Lorsie

customer_reviews.title: its adorable - I love the color and the size
customer_reviews.text: its adorable - I love the color and the size.. I bought it so that I don't disrupt the rest of my house hold in the morning when getting my stuff together in the kitchen or making my coffee in the morning... now I just keep my cream in the fridge and the coffee maker on top.. I wake up to fresh coffee every day and don't have to leave my bedroom and fear waking my housemates.. this mini fridge was the perfect size for the little things I needed it for .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cool color works great nice price shipped fast what more can i say. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: MIchael S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, Love!!! The color is awesome and its perfect for my woman cave/slash walk in closet which happens to be orange and white. The price was on point as well. Great Purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter took this frig to college. the school color is orange and she lovedit
customer_reviews.author: Lita

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I received this piece today - it was broken in the back and leaking a slimy substance. When I plugged it in, the room filled with a horrible smell. It's totally nonfunctional and my university has already thrown away all the packaging. I'm stuck with a fridge that doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: Tara Victor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good little fridge! No complaints. Keeps my drinks cold! hizah!
customer_reviews.author: Peter G.

customer_reviews.title: Not orange
customer_reviews.text: We bought it in orange and immediately returned because the color was not what was shown in pictures. Instead of a true orange, it is more of a creamy sherbet color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those work cubicles.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. Product and color, for me, were just as discribed. This little fridge is more than I expected. Plenty of room and extremely quiet in my work cubicle. I’d recommend this product for anyone looking for something quiet and small.
customer_reviews.author: Cade

customer_reviews.title: The Fridge I Always Wanted!!
customer_reviews.text: Was excited purchasing this fridge and now I’m more excited that I have it. I love that it’s energy saving. The little freezer part is positioned different than I see most mini fridge but it was just something to get used to. So far, It has been great to have.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle xoxo

customer_reviews.title: Works great, the price is right
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a beer fridge for my garage, Works great, the price is right, and available in a lot of great colors. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has a nice little freezer compartment
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my bedroom to store ice packs after breaking a limb. It has a nice little freezer compartment. Now I love having a fridge as a nightstand, even though this is probably meant for dorm rooms
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small fridge for my office, and this was perfect. Good size for me, is quiet, doesnt get hot and is super cute. Its not as pumpkin orange as it seems in the pic though...a bit more burnt orange, but I still like it
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and freezer!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color to go in my bedroom, matches my room and doesn’t look like an average appliance. Love the little freezer with the mini ice cube tray!
customer_reviews.author: Sharla C. Shuck

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our small biz office - The color is exactly the shade of orange we were hoping for. It's super BRIGHT and awesome!
customer_reviews.author: MrsAJG

customer_reviews.title: This fridge is amazing and so cute
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh!!! This fridge is amazing and so cute!! Love it! I was very pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: lcook

customer_reviews.title: GREAT COLOR, GREAT PRICE, VERY QUIET AND EFFICIENT.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal for the price: apparently the orange isn't as popular as the other colors. It's not as bright an orange as in the picture--closer to a deep pumpkin orange--which I really like. I get lots of compliments on it at the office.
customer_reviews.author: alltatup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Under My Desk
customer_reviews.text: Got her un-packaged and plugged in, works and looks great, can't hear it over the fan on my super computer which is even more of a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: TjS

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It isn't orange it is a weird pastel rust color.
customer_reviews.author: Faiza Hughell

customer_reviews.title: it is loud
customer_reviews.text: I is disappointing, first I know it is a mini fridge but honestly you can't put more than 20 cans. It is super loud and I can hear it all the time . It doesn't get really cold so your cans are cold.. but not like REALLY cold. I would return it if I had the original box
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fridge for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Love my new fridge!!! It fits under my desk and keeps everything nice and cold. I pulled the shelf out of my old fridge and put in in the new fridge for more storage space. The fridge looks and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, true to the color. It can fit quite a few things while being compact and the fruit tray and ice cube mold was an added bonus! I will certainly be using this for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Spontaneously combusts! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 13 months ago for my wife to use in her classroom ( pre-k teacher) and today while being out on leave due to a recent surgery, her aid notified her that it started smoking and had filled up the classroom with smoke! It was in the open with plenty of ventilation and nothing touching it and has been treated correctly since day one. Had this happened over the holiday or at night it could have caught fire and burned the school down. I'll never purchase an RCA product again and RCA should be ashamed of themselves! I'm thankful someone caught it in time! DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Karson

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Speedy delivery. Love it, fits great in my office under my desk. It's also a big conversation piece being purple!
customer_reviews.author: Shaunda Petty

customer_reviews.title: It was delivered upside down, Sat that way for ...
customer_reviews.text: I posted a bad review, only about the delivery of this fridge. Now that I have had it for a while its a great addition to my man cave. I wonder how I went so long without it. I keep my stuff in it and don't have to bother the family in the kitchen. Good quality and hope it last since it was delivered upside down and sat that way for 3 hours. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Dead in 1 month
customer_reviews.text: After reading the negative reviews, I decided to take a chance. It dead in 1 month. Now I do believe the bad reviews :(
customer_reviews.author: L. Oliver Ouyang

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: It's quiet, it's cute and it looks good in my cubicle at work. My husband added a lock that I bought so nothing can be taken or used when I'm not at work. It keeps drinks cold and I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for dorm life!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this almost a year ago and I absolutely love my mini fridge! It is perfect for college and fits right under my bed! Not noisy at all and perfect for dorm life. Just make sure you adjust the ice box temperature so your ice cream doesnt melt! Honestly this is the best for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mandipants

customer_reviews.title: ... Fridge in April for my classroom and I am sad to say it will not cool now in August
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Fridge in April for my classroom and I am sad to say it will not cool now in August. The temperature is a little cooler than room temp but not much. Loved the color and the other reviews made it seem like it would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette M.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I can't give a good review of the fridge but only the condition it arrived in. It showed up in the OEM box from the factory. The boX was tore up and taped back together. It looks like it has been dropped more than once. The bottom adjustable leg was smashed up causing deformed and bulged areas on the back and sides of the fridge. It looked terrible. We never tried to plug it in. We packed it back up way better than it arrived and sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: LLP

customer_reviews.title: Currently living out this dorm fridge.
customer_reviews.text: Our not quite 3 year old fridge gave up the ghost last week. We had purchased this for our daughters dorm room and had it stored (thankfully). We did buy this from the Amazon Warehouse pretty abused, but it's working great. We have 4 half gallons of soy milk, 3 large mason jars and some square leftover bowls on the bottom, creamer and small pill bottle things in the door, and a few frozen items in the freezer (would fit couple microwave meals or some veggie burger patties). Good seal on the door which is also reversible.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: nice and cool inside
customer_reviews.text: I just want to update my review and give you guys some feedback! So I've had this maybe a little over a year now, still runs, nice and cool inside, but I think a little too cool in some spots and not so much on others. So my ice part wasn't freezing but the whole thing did besides that part which I thought was hilarious but like really... complete opposite Haha.(just have to have the temp nob just right i guess) But other than that I love it. I love the color, keeps my drinks amazingly cold. Doesn't use too much electricity so thank You! Love mine. Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little fridge.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice little fridge to have for bedroom to keep beverage and some food. At the beginning, the order was made to deliver to my old address by mistake. I contacted the amazon customer service as soon as I found out, and the lady was very nice and replace the order right away. The fridge reached very fast. It is small enough to be kept in a corner. You can also keep it under a table just for convenience. It runs about every 15-20 minutes with not very loud noise. I am a light sleeper, but the noise does not bother me much in the night.
customer_reviews.author: Kiara. Z

customer_reviews.title: RUN away from anythiing manufactured by Curtco.
customer_reviews.text: the product failed due to a worker kinking a coolant line. this falls under 90 day 'labor'. the manufacturer will not warranty the product. READ THE WARRANTY, then NEVER by a Curtco product: 1. The defective product should be mailed to: In the U.S.A. Curtis International Ltd. C/O Lotus International Company 6880 Commerce Blvd. Canton MI 48187 U.S.A. 5. 6. If mailing the product, the freight must be prepaid and a money order for $7.00 should be included to cover the cost of insurance and the return of the product. The money order must be made payable to Curtco International Ltd.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what is advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is not the advertised product. It is a fridge and works but smaller that the advertisement of what was purchased. went through having another one sent and that 2nd one is the same one as the first. Different logo in front and a 1.6 not 1.7 cf size. Not sure why the mistake but if i hd to guess it might be an older model that is shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I called into Curtis like so many other folks was told to to a ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived DOA, I called into Curtis like so many other folks was told to to a factory reset, here it is so you can just try it before returning yours: Turn temperature controller up and down 6 times (up to 6 back to off) Turn off, unplug Wait 30 minutes Plug in set to 6 and wait 5-10 if it doesn't start cooling its a goner My suggestion is if you do buy this plug it in ASAP so when you find out its dead you can get a full refund and free return shipping from Amazon. We're really bummed this didn't work out, it was exactly what we were looking for. Now the search goes on!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rogalski

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it's an awesome fridge and it does everything a fridge should do ...
customer_reviews.text: Word of advice, if the freezer part of this fridge is what sells you on it, look elsewhere. Otherwise it's an awesome fridge and it does everything a fridge should do (like keep beer cold.)
customer_reviews.author: Trace

customer_reviews.title: Refrigerator in good shape....shipping box a mess
customer_reviews.text: Received refrigerator today with only a small scratch on the top. The box it was packaged in was a mess. I am feeling very lucky considering others who received theirs dented and scratched. If it were packaged better there would probably not an issue. We plugged it in and it started cooling right away. Right now we, (my little girl), is very happy with her purple refrigerator. Keeping my fingers crossed that we don't have any issues. Will update in a few weeks. Included a photo of scratches on top of refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: S reed scroggins

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as promised!!
customer_reviews.text: Dispite the reviews I took a chance and bought this cute little fridge because I loved the color. I am pleased to say it came damage free and worked as promised! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Flow Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This little fridge fits perfectly under my "L"-shaped desk in my office. I keep all sorts of goodies in it that my wife doesn't know about! :o)
customer_reviews.author: G. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little fridge
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little fridge. Does not make loud noises when compressor kicks on. I keep it under my desk at work. I never notice it running.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Temp control is off and leaks inside
customer_reviews.text: This fridge is okay but not the best. I went through several other fridges even name brand fridges and I ended up choosing this one based on reviews. So i have the temp on 5 bc 4 isn’t cold enough. The fridge leaks inside like water is always dripping from the freezer tray then the freezer tray has water that’s Iced so I assume at some pint the temp of fridge lowers on its own causing the leakage inside. It’s true for the door that the handles are flimsy so it does not hold water bottles like that
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa J

customer_reviews.title: Freezes all contents, even on the bottom shelf
customer_reviews.text: Was going great the first month but now it freezes all the contents in the fridge, even items on the very bottom under other content. I turned the dial all the way down and it's still freezing everything! Freezer shelf lid broke off due to being frozen in place and covered in ice and I couldn't get the contents out of the freezer. It's small, compact and cute but this freezing of everything sucks! I have to keep throwing items out because it froze my fresh produce. ARGH!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No stolen food and satisfaction of hunger pangs.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone at my work wishes they had this at their desk. It fits a lot. Like a big container of salad greens; thin mints in the "freezer" section, multiple cans and bottles of sparking water; and there's still more space. The red color really pops also. One annoying thing is that there is a rubber bumper on the freezer door that keeps falling off and I had to affix in place with a piece of tape (see photo). Other than that, it's been a life saver and fairly well constructed. No hunger goes on for long, and no lunches get stolen, and all the expectant mothers in my office have a place to keep their breastmilk!
customer_reviews.author: Philopolis

customer_reviews.title: Tiny fridge with timely delivery
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a relative who lives in a nursing home. Very happy with the small size. Smallest fridge I have seen ... which makes it perfect for our use. Seems to be working fine -- ice cream stay solid in the mini freezer. Shipping from the seller was fast. Hopefully the RCA brand brings quality.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho Guy

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I am highly satisfied with my little fridge so far! It's not at all loud like some customers have claimed. I am a teacher, and I have it in my classroom, so the size is perfect. My food and drinks stay nice and cool, and the unique color is a nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel G.

customer_reviews.title: Good size, works well.
customer_reviews.text: Good sized, showed up un-damaged, removed the packing tape from the inside, plugged 'er in, and it worked nicely. They include a drip and an ice-cube tray for added effect. Don't try finding the temperature control inside the fridge though - it's on the back over by the compressor....first time I've ever seen anything like that, but oh well. Next day the bottles of water were cooled off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this fridge, it makes an awful sound!
customer_reviews.text: The fridge makes an awful gurgling sound the whole time. I tried to return it but I procrastinated getting it to the post office so now I am stuck with it. It works fine but it is even smaller than I thought and it sounds like there is a brewing coffee maker going all the time.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Love already
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it, I do admit the freezer door was a little unaligned and I had to pop that back into place, and the door on mine doesn't seem completely flush with the inside. So I have to kind of have to use more force but nothing too serious. It's awesome !
customer_reviews.author: Josh Little

customer_reviews.title: Even the freezer works well!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little fridge!! I read the reviews and some say they weren't sure if the freezer would actually keep things frozen. Well let me tell you, it definitely does!! I needed it to keep some ice cool throughout the day to ice my back and after about two hours, I tried to pull a bag of half melted ice out and struggled to get it out because it had completely frozen back up into a the shape of the freezer! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Needed for work. Keeps things very cold and fresh. Perfect. Follow the reviews for things people and you can find a gem like this for a reasonable price. Compared to all the others i saw on amazon and had the best ratings.
customer_reviews.author: ImTonkaTough

customer_reviews.title: Nice red and GRAY fridge
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my dad. He recently redid his garage with a bunch of craftsman red tool cabinets. This matches them perfectly. It keeps his drinks frosty and looks good doing it. It should be noted though that the handle and trim on this are actually a dull gray color. They appeared silver in the pictures but are most definitely gray in real life. Not a huge deal but something that should be a little clearer in the ad.
customer_reviews.author: bee newby

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my office to keep drinks and snacks in.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to keep in my office because I don't take a lunch and there isn't much time between patients. I can keep a gallon of green tea, a large bottle of flavored coffee creamer a bag of grapes, and 2 bottles of 16 oz tea. The color is nice and looks like it belongs in my office. Works great for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: PsychE19

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a RCA, got a Frigidaire??
customer_reviews.text: Well. I ordered a red RCA mini fridge & got a red Frigidaire mini fridge? I'm cool with that considering I didn't know that RCA made appliances, but it was weird that it was a totally different manufacturer than what I actually ordered. So far so good. Installed in our pop up that we are remodeling.
customer_reviews.author: Fields9068

customer_reviews.title: A perfect little fridge for my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: The name on the fridge is igloo famous for coolers and thermoses, this fits perfectly under my desk in my bedroom, so late at night I Don't have to walk into the kitchen and I'm disabled. I've had it running for 24 hours everything is cool but I do find the compressor and a little bit too annoying when it goes on for my bedroom but I'll get used of it, as of yet not made ice.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD FUSEY

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Lavender Color
customer_reviews.text: I will have to update this review once we have stocked the fridge to see how cold it keeps items. But, I did want to say that the box it was delivered in looked ok. The fridge did have a dent in it, where the side meets the top. And two or three minor scratches on that same side. I think the company needs to take more care when packaging their product, and insure better quality control, since this seems to be a common complaint in previous reviews.
customer_reviews.author: honest reviews

customer_reviews.title: A little on the small side, but works just fine
customer_reviews.text: Slightly smaller than my previous fridge. My previous fridge could hold 12 - 12oz cans on the bottom shelf. This one only holds 11. Not a big deal. Somewhat noisy, but not too bad. Performance is good and keeps things cool, which is what you want at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S. Tsuda

customer_reviews.title: Roll the dice on shipping damage.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dented in two places - one was because when they tightened the plastic shipping straps they went too far and actually bent the top corner of the fridge. The other was a casualty of UPS shipping - both minor but hey - you asked.
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Very noisy. Sounds like a toilet flushing over and over. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Woody

customer_reviews.title: very very cute fridge
customer_reviews.text: placed it on top of my file drawer in my office and it became a hit! everyone loves how it looks. it came with no damage thank goodness and so far it’s still functioning fine and quiet
customer_reviews.author: Miz Eastlake

customer_reviews.title: Damaged unit arrived.
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived in a well.packaged box with no visible signs of damage. After unpacking the unit I found many scratches to the top, sides and front with no apparent reason for the damage. The unit started and chilled properly.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bedroom and Its perfect. I was worried about it being loud because of the reviews but it actually isn’t loud at all. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nip

customer_reviews.title: Item was damaged during shipment
customer_reviews.text: This product was damaged during shipment/delivery and there is a smashed corner on the rear back of the refrigerator. I needed this for my mother who is in a nursing home and wanted to have something to cool her diabetic drinks. I'm not sure if there is any fault with the unit - it seemed to cool off when I delivered it to her room but the bent corner is somewhat evident. I have taken a photo of what is wrong and included it in this summary. Please advise what can be done, if anything.
customer_reviews.author: brenda johnson

customer_reviews.title: Seahawks Fridge!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new "Seahawks" fridge! I bought big logo stickers and gave him this fridge for Christmas. He thinks it's cool he can stock his fridge with so many drinks! It's quiet and we have had no issues with it. Color is a true lime green! Don't think! Just buy it! You will be happy!💚💙💚💙
customer_reviews.author: CRYSTAL

customer_reviews.title: No temperature control - acts more like a mini-deep freezer
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon deliveryperson tossed the fridge onto my porch like it was an empty box. As a result, it ended up with a massive dent. I decided to go with it since there would be something stacked on top and it’s such a hassle to return items. But now that I’m using it, this thing is awful. The temp setting is at its warmest and yet everything inside is frozen solid. Horrible temperature control. Major disappointment all around.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived missing one little black corner leg piece thingy, and there's a small dent in the door, but it runs to quietly, it can get as cold as you need it to, and it's the perfect size and color, the other stuff can be overlooked. It's really a wonderful little fridge. Perfect for dorm rooms!
customer_reviews.author: Maybe-It's-Butter

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, but DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: We love the size, the color... so cute but darn, it quit working within 3 months, and we are stuck and can not return it. It FREEZES EVERYTHING, EVERY SETTING... FREEZES. Great as a mini freezer, but not what it is meant for
customer_reviews.author: Melinda B Miner

customer_reviews.title: Small, efficient and  Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: Quiet. Does not ice up. For use of small refrigerator needs. Just right. Good price. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great office/garage fridge
customer_reviews.text: Great office/garage fridge. I wanted the smallest fridge for my office and this is it. It easily fits a few lunch meat packages and about three 6-packs (soft drinks, of course). Plus a nice little freezer area. If you want small, yet effective, this is your fridge.
customer_reviews.author: AA8

customer_reviews.title: Great little refrigerator! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great little refrigerator! I purchased this icebox for my husband, as a Christmas present for his office. He was really please with it, and loved the lime green color. The package arrived in one piece, with no damage. I purchased the extended warranty for this on Amazon, just in case, but no problems so far. It runs quiet, and keeps beverages and food very cold. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eninja67

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed. I ordered this item with an adjustable thermostat control but it came without any control. Compressor makes weird sounds. Very quiet when compressor not on, but loud compressor for such a small fridge.
customer_reviews.author: M. Green

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge
customer_reviews.text: So this has lasted just fine for months so far, and feel confident if something does happen we can get help from tech... works great for me, and holds a decent bit of food. really quiet, and a nice reversible door design.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fridge!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little fridge! I love RCA products. I've had RCA products since I was little. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: April Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this little fridge to go in my cubicle at work. It brightens up my cube. It works well and has plenty of room for anything I would need to put in it. It even has a tiny freezer that hold the frozen meals I often heat up at lunch. I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: No temperature control.
customer_reviews.text: Was disappointed that there is no temperature control inside, as stated in the description. Packaging was unbelievably poor. Missing parts of the cardboard and tape everywhere. Was scratched and dented. Would have sent it back if we were putting it where anyone would see it, but it works and we needed it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Freezer keeps melting
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this fridge for 3 months now and the freezer keeps melting and refreezing; getting water all over everything. The water gets in the floor when the door is opened. It has always been in setting 6 and just turned it up to 7. Hoping that helps...bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and runs very quietly and efficiently. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bowlist

customer_reviews.title: Small but cool!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and undamaged, keeps temp very well. Only issue is the gurgling noise the freon makes as it circulates but it is quiet and unobtrusive
customer_reviews.author: Austin tx

customer_reviews.title: It's a happy little fridge
customer_reviews.text: After having it for about 2 years it still works like a charm. great for snacks and drinks. however if you tap the temperature control dial slightly it will freeze anything you have in there. Very delicate, but a good mini fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: I just bought this fridge for my office and so ...
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this fridge for my office and so far I would say, it is definitely NOT QUIET. It is making a light buzzing sound every time the 'engine' is working. I think if noise if a factor, skip this fridge and find an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Fridge-nomenal.
customer_reviews.text: It's a fridge. It works and looks good, isn't too noisy or too cold, and isn't freezing, even for the waters directly below the freezer, which is really nice. The freezer really doesn't freeze stuff, but for that price don't expect it to. It's certainly very cold, though.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and cute plus it keeps things cold.
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably quiet! I really cannot hear it and it is in the bathroom off my bedroom with the door open. However the cat startles when it goes on and off so it must have an out-of-human hearing range sound to it. Chilled down to 46 degrees, and it made ice cubes overnight in the cutest little ice cube tray ever.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy g

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months the unit stopped working. Now dealing with a complicated warranty process where I have to call one number, provide serial number etc, to get a reference number, and then have to email the reference number along with multiple photos of the unit somewhere else. Not worth the hassle... buy something of better quality with better customer service.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Great little fridge.
customer_reviews.text: The one I received was Igloo, not RCA, but it's exactly the same as far as I can tell. It's super quiet, roomy, and keeps very cold! You can't fit much in the little freezer, maybe one frozen meal, but for my purposes it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JennyP

customer_reviews.title: Good product easy return.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item for Aesthetician room and it was a bit noisy for spa room. So I returned, as my need wasn't this particular item. I love the color and it was in god shape. I'd definitely would have kept if it met my need. Returning was easy and I got my refund as soon as they received item back. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Precious Love

customer_reviews.title: Worked fantastic. It's small size (dimensions were as advertised) made ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked fantastic. It's small size (dimensions were as advertised) made it easy to conceal so I could keep my beverages nice and cool on the sly in my office. Just disguise it as a cardboard box or something and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: This will be perfect for my aunt who lives in an assisted living place. She loves her Pepsi!!
customer_reviews.author: janet horner

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Love the color. Works well. Just VERY loud. Had to move to laundry room because it was too loud for TV room/study.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Moss S.

product_meta.title: RCA RFR160-Orange Compact Fridge, 1.6 Cubic Feet, Orange
product_meta.description:
RCA RFR160-Orange Compact Fridge, 1.6 Cubic Feet, Orange

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Is your favorite color orange? Well now you can have a fridge to match your color! RCA's latest 1.6 fridge is available in a wide variety of colors. This Orange mini fridge with silver trim will enhance the look of any room! Inside the refrigerator there is 1.6 cu ft of cooling space. There is an Ice Cube chamber and ice tray so you can always have ice ready made and frozen. With a clever reversible door which allows you to open the fridge to the right or left, as well as the space saving flush back design you can place thus fridge basically anywhere! Perfect to keep food and drinks cold, no matter what the temperature outside is, as this fridge is compressor cooled! Great for bed rooms, dorm rooms, offices etc. Your mini fridge contains an adjustable thermostat so you can get your food and drinks to the perfect temperature. If you are looking for a stylish fun and effective small fridge, look no further as this RCA fridge will meet all your needs.
feature_bullets: Orange Mini Fridge with Silver Trim - 1.6 Cu Ft Capacity
Reversibile Door (Allows for Right or Left Opening)
Adjustable Thermostat and Compressor Cooling for ultimate performance even in hot weather
Door Basket for 2 Liter Bottles; Ice Cube Chamber with Tray

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars64 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
